overview.summary: Microsoft 365 Copilot Mastery training equips you with advanced skills to leverage AI-powered productivity tools across the Microsoft 365 suite. Learn to maximize efficiency and create innovative solutions using Copilot in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Teams, and Outlook.

Create custom Copilot solutions and prompts
Optimize Copilot for specific business scenarios
overview.targetAudience: Microsoft 365 users, administrators, and power users who want to master AI-powered productivity tools and implement Copilot solutions in their organizations.

faq.question: Do I need a Copilot license?
faq.answer: Yes, you need an active Microsoft 365 Copilot license to participate in the hands-on labs and fully experience the features covered in this course.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: This course focuses on practical usage and productivity techniques rather than deep technical implementation. However, it does cover enterprise deployment concepts.

faq.question: What Microsoft 365 applications are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers Copilot in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Teams, Outlook, and other Microsoft 365 applications.

faq.question: Will I learn prompt engineering?
faq.answer: Yes, prompt engineering is a key component of the course, teaching you how to create effective prompts for various scenarios and applications.
